body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### SemVer Major ‚ö†Ô∏è (breaking changes)
* Change type of HTTPBody.Length.known from Int to Int64 by @simonjbeaumont in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/79
* Move to Swift 5.9 as the minimum version by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/80
* Remove deprecated code by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/81
### SemVer Minor
* Base64EncodedData initializer taking an array slice shouldn't have a label by @PARAIPAN9 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/71
* [Multipart] Add public types by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/77
* [Multipart] Add converter SPI methods by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/78
### SemVer Patch
* [Multipart] Introduce a bytes -> frames parser by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/72
* [Multipart] Add the frame -> bytes serializer by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/73
* [Multipart] Add a frames -> raw parts parsing sequence by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/74
* [Multipart] Add a raw parts to frames serializer sequence. by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/75
* [Multipart] Validation sequence by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/76
### Other Changes
* Apply the same .swift-format as the generator repo by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/68
* Add README badges by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/70
* Bump version docs to 1.0.0-alpha.1 by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/82


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/compare/0.3.6...1.0.0-alpha.1
title: Swift OpenAPI Runtime 1.0.0-alpha.1

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed since 1.0.0-alpha.1
### SemVer Patch
* Remove no-longer-needed `@preconcurrency`s by @MahdiBM in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/83
* [Docs] Make sure all symbols are curated by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/88
### Other Changes
* Add visionOS platform support by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/85
* Add Docker Compose file for Swift 5.9.0 by @simonjbeaumont in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/86
* [Docs] Prep 1.0.0 by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/89

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/compare/1.0.0-alpha.1...1.0.0

## What's Changed since 0.3.6
### SemVer Major
* Change type of HTTPBody.Length.known from Int to Int64 by @simonjbeaumont in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/79
* Move to Swift 5.9 as the minimum version by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/80
* Remove deprecated code by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/81
### SemVer Minor
* Base64EncodedData initializer taking an array slice shouldn't have a label by @PARAIPAN9 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/71
* [Multipart] Add public types by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/77
* [Multipart] Add converter SPI methods by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/78
### SemVer Patch
* [Multipart] Introduce a bytes -> frames parser by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/72
* [Multipart] Add the frame -> bytes serializer by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/73
* [Multipart] Add a frames -> raw parts parsing sequence by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/74
* [Multipart] Add a raw parts to frames serializer sequence. by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/75
* [Multipart] Validation sequence by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/76
* Remove no-longer-needed `@preconcurrency`s by @MahdiBM in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/83
* [Docs] Make sure all symbols are curated by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/88
### Other Changes
* Apply the same .swift-format as the generator repo by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/68
* Add README badges by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/70
* Bump version docs to 1.0.0-alpha.1 by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/82
* Add visionOS platform support by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/85
* Add Docker Compose file for Swift 5.9.0 by @simonjbeaumont in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/86

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/compare/0.3.6...1.0.0
title: 1.0.0 üöÄ

body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## ‚ö†Ô∏è API-breaking changes

This release changes the `ClientTransport`, `ClientMiddleware`, `ServerTransport`, and `ServerMiddleware` protocols in line with the approved proposals [SOAR-0004](https://swiftpackageindex.com/apple/swift-openapi-generator/main/documentation/swift-openapi-generator/soar-0004) and [SOAR-0005](https://swiftpackageindex.com/apple/swift-openapi-generator/main/documentation/swift-openapi-generator/soar-0005). See the proposals for details on how to migrate.

The TL;DR is:
- the HTTP currency types are now imported from [swift-http-types](https://github.com/apple/swift-http-types)
- unstructured bodies, which were previous either `Foundation.Data` or `Swift.String` are now `OpenAPIRuntime.HTTPBody`, which represents an async sequence of byte chunks, unlocking fully streaming use cases

## What's Changed
### SemVer Minor
* Async bodies + swift-http-types adoption by @czechboy0 in https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/pull/47


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/apple/swift-openapi-runtime/compare/0.2.5...0.3.0
title: Swift OpenAPI Runtime 0.3.0
